item.description:
ATTENTION: NEW ROOM AND EARLY START!!!

 

Boston's brightest and sharpest minds are meeting again this month to meet face to face with one of Israels most respected leaders. We are honored to be hosting Danny Yatom, who will share with us his thoughts and lessons from over 33 years of extensive, military, intelligence, political and private sector business leadership experience. From IDF, Mossad, Knesset, and Private companies, Danny has led through many of the challenges we face in our entrepreneurial lives (hopefully on a smaller scale). Danny will talk about his transition to the private sector and what he has carried through, and how it applies in business life.

 

After Danny's session, we'll have Igor Katsman present his awesome startup, that just won a finalist spot a the Mass Challenge in October. 

 

TechAviv is starting early this month, so plan ahead and be there for at 6:00PM!

 

November Presenters: 

Special Guest - Danny Yatom
Driveway - Igor Katsman - Co-Founder & CTO (@drvway) 

When & Where:

November 16th, 2011 at 6:00PM 

MIT 
Building E62 - Room 223 
50 Memorial Drive 
Cambridge, MA

Agenda: 
6:00pm-6:30pm Networking & Intros (Pizza) 
6:30pm-7:30pm Danny Yotam & Q&A, Startup Demo(s) Q&A 
7:30pm-8:00pm Member Announcements & Networking

Looking to hire top Israeli talent? 
Post free on the TechAviv Job Board

Thanks to our Sponsors 
The Boston TechAviv Founders Club is made possible because we have great sponsors. Special thanks to: 
Nixon Peabody and are new sponsor ExchangeGuru!

Sponsorship Opportunities 
Please email Gil or Yaron if you are interested or know somebody who is interested in sponsoring or presenting at the Boston branch or global TechAviv Founders Club.

See you soon!

Gil & Yaron 
@giljzim 
@YaronSamid 
@TechAviv 
www.techaviv.com

item.name: Danny Yatom @ TechAviv MA Nov 16, 2011, 6pm Meetup at MIT
